import React, {useContext}from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import styles from './index.module.css' import useLogin from 'client/hooks/useLogin' import Lists from 'client/components/list' const userInitial = {login: false, name: 'Guest'} export const UserContext = React.createContext(userInitial) export default function Index() { const [isLogin, userLogin, userLogout] = useLogin() const user = useContext(UserContext) console.log(user.name) return ( <>
Home
